item.title: Dead & Company’s SF Shows Will Be Livestreamed for Home Viewing Via Nugs, on Top of Imax Screenings
item.description: Fans of the Grateful Dead and its offshoot Dead & Company will have multiple ways to access the latter group’s upcoming weekend of 60th-anniversary-commemorating shows at San Francisco&#8217
